name: Crash Maze
description:
Best new puzzle game!

Challenge yourself and destroy all blocks on each map. Control the ball and make the right moves to find the best possible way to complete each level. Enjoy beautiful colors, dynamic movement of the ball & destroying castles of blocks.

Features:

- Maze-like puzzles
- Handcrafted levels to make it challenging for you
- Fun & fast ball movement
- Sweet destruction satisfaction!
- Beautiful color-schemes
- Simple & relaxing experience
